org.fcrepo.auth.oauth.impl

Class DefaultTokenRequestValidations

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fcrepo.auth.oauth.impl.DefaultTokenRequestValidations
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TokenRequestValidations

    public class DefaultTokenRequestValidations
extends Object
implements TokenRequestValidations
    Default audits and validations for an OAuth token request

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DefaultTokenRequestValidations(SessionFactory sessions)
      Instantiate the default audits and validations for an OAuth token request, using information stored in a jcr workspace accessible via the given session factory.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Checks the validity of the client associated with the given request
      boolean isValidCredentials(org.apache.oltu.oauth2.as.request.OAuthTokenRequest oauthRequest)
      Checks the validity of the authN credentials associated with the given request
      boolean isValidSecret(org.apache.oltu.oauth2.as.request.OAuthTokenRequest oauthRequest)
      Checks the validity of the secret given with the given request
